options.name: Trolleater
options.description: Regeneration (5+), Multiple Wounds (2, towards Height 3).

options.name: Godspeaker
options.description:
Attached, Fearless.
The bearer’s unit gains Unstable (the model may join units without Unstable during Deployment despite having Unstable).

options.name: Scraplord
options.description:
Commanding Presence (12", Scrapling).
Units with Scrapling property lose Unruly as long as the bearer is on the Battlefield.
As long as the bearer is joined to a unit of Scraplings, its model counts as being of the same Height as its unit for the purpose of allocating Ranged Attacks.

options.name: Hoardmaster
options.description:
+1 Arm, Weapon Master, and may not take any Weapon Enchantment.
In addition, the bearer gains the following weapons: Great Weapon, Halberd, Paired Weapons, Iron Fist.

options.name: Headhunter
options.description: The model part with Goblin gains March and Shoot, Poison Attacks (Melee and Shooting), and gains Throwing Weapons (4+) with Shots 3.

options.name: Firebrand
options.description:
Shamans with one or more spells from Pyromancy only
Breath Attack (Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks), Flaming Attacks, Resistance (Flaming Attacks), and automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.
The model can cast Dragon’s Roar (Pyromancy) as a Bound Spell (5+).

options.name: Gut Roarer
options.description: Channel (1), Horror.

options.name: Spinesplitter
options.description: The bearer gains Devastating Charge (+1 Att, +1 Str, +1 AP).

options.name: Rottenjaw
options.description:
Poison Attacks, Immune (Poison Attacks).
Friendly Kin-Eater units may reroll failed Ambush rolls while the bearer is on the Battlefield.

options.name: Banner of the Gyengget
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains First Strike(re-roll to-hit and to-wound rolls of ‘1’).

options.name: Pennant of the Great Grass Sky
options.description: The bearer’s unit’s Charge Range rolls gain Maximised, and its Flee Distance rolls gain Minimised.

options.name: Skull of Qenghet
options.description: The bearer’s unit gains Terror.

options.name: Khagadai's Legacy
options.description: Multiple Wounds (D3).

options.name: Viper's Curse
options.description:
Poison Attacks (Melee & Shooting).
Shots set to 4, Str 4, AP 2 and always hits on 4+. It cannot benefit from Area Attack, Direct Hit.

options.name: Heart-Ripper
options.description: +1 AP, Lethal Strike, and always hits on at least 3+.

options.name: Ritual Bloodletter
options.description:
+1 Att.

While the wielder’s unit is Engaged in Combat, the wielder must reroll Magic Dice that roll ‘1’ for its Casting Rolls.

options.name: Aurochs Resilience
options.description:
+1 Res, and Mountain Hide.
The model automatically fails all Special Saves.

options.name: Wrestler's Belt
options.description: +1 Arm, +1 Str and Devastating Charge(+1 Arm).

options.name: Mammoth-Hide Cloak
options.description: +1 Arm. Attacks against the wearer can never have more than Str 5.

options.name: Lygur's Tongue
options.description: Afflict(-2 Off).

options.name: Yeti Furs
options.description: Touch of Frost, Strider.

options.name: Rampager's Chain
options.description: The bearer gains Stomp Attack(D3+1), and all models in the bearer's unit must reroll failed to-wound rolls with Stomp Attack.

options.name: Hunting Spear (4+), Iron Fist and Poison Attacks (Shooting)
options.parsername: Hunting Spear , Iron Fist and Poison Attacks (Shooting) (4+)

options.name: Brace of Ogre Pistols (4+) and Lethal Strike (Shooting)
options.parsername: Brace of Ogre Pistols and Lethal Strike (Shooting) (4+)
